price: (39) O [my] two companions of prison, are separate lords better or Allāh, the One,[597] the Prevailing?[598]
arabic: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ ءَأَرۡبَابٞ مُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيۡرٌ أَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ
footnotes:
[597]- Single, individual and unique in His attributes and His deeds.
[598]- He who subdues doubts and false arguments with clear evidences and who subdues and imposes His will upon all creation.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yāṣāḥibayi al-sij'ni a-arbābun mutafarriqūna khayrun ami al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
